```{r}
#2*x1+x2+x3+8*x4+h1=6
#x1+x2+2*x3+4*x4+h2=4
A <- rbind(c(2, 1, 1, 8, 6), c(1, 1, 2, 4, 2))
m <- 2
n<-4
AI <- cbind(A, diag(m))
b <-c (6,4)
```

```{r}
nsb <- choose(n+m,m)
library(gtools)
combi <- combinations(n+m,m)
```

```{r}
J<-rbind(c(1,2),c(1,3), c(1,4), c(2,3), c(2,4), c(3,4))
calcula_sb<-function(M,J,b){
 solucion<-rep(0,n+m)
 M[,J]-> aux
 if(det(aux==0)){return(F)}
 solucion[J] <- solve(aux,b)
return(solucion)
}
calcula_sb(AI,C(1,2),b)

#bucles en todas las seleccionadas

for(i in 1:combi){
  calcular_sb(AI,C[i,],b)
}
```
